answers.answer: We can't get my blood pressure under control and I'm allergic to the meds so they don't have a choice it got so high this weekend they thought I was going to have a stroke so I spent the weekend in L&D
I had my daughter at 34 weeks due to low fluid. She weighed 5lbs 9.9oz and was completely fine and healthy. Didn't go in to the NICU after birth was with
I'm sure you lil one will be fine. Praying for your lil one
its scary delivering early i had my twins at 24 weeks
I'm hoping that's how it goes, I got steroid shot at 28 weeks hoping it did enough
I had my son a year ago at 34 weeks and i didn't get steriod shots and he came out perfect weighing 6lbs 4oz and didn't have to go to the nicu
Hope everything works out for you

I had severe preeclampsia with my first and had an emergency c section at exactly 35weeks. I never got the steroid shots. He weighed 4lbs 7oz at birth. Only stayed 6days in the nicu. Never had any problems. Didn't need any tubes or machines. They kept him there to make sure he kept eating fine and gained weight and because he failed the car seat test. Eventually we left the hospital and had to take him home in a car bed instead.
You'll be fine hun and your baby will be perfect. I'll keep you and your baby in my prayers

question: Looks like I will be having my baby next week at 34 weeks if I don't have her before, I was really hoping to make it longer but my body is not going to let that happen
title: preemies
